author: Meghan Roos
title: Attorney General Describes Stay-at-Home Orders As 'Disturbingly Close' To House Arrest
description: William Barr said that states must soon begin replacing the orders with more targeted restrictions.
content:
U.S. Attorney General William Barr said the coronavirus pandemic was placing "unprecedented burdens" on Americans' civil liberties during a Tuesday radio interview with broadcast journalist Hugh Hewitt.
Though Barr said the stay-at-home orders that states is… [+2702 chars]
